Title: Profit Mastery: Chasheen
Description:
I am totally on to another great scam!

When I was flying overhead I saw a really ancient tigress prowling about.

Do you know how much her blood would go for on the black market? Not to mention if I convince some warlocks it adds extra potency to their summoning spells or something.

If you bring me back some of her blood I will cut you in on the scam. She was prowling about on the far side of the Dojani River from here.
CompletionText: I thought about taking that tiger on myself but to be honest I like living...
RewardText: Impressive! Can you smell the money? Here's your end.
